org.gvsig.raster.impl.provider

Interface TiledRasterProvider

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    TileFileFormatProvider, TileProvider, WMTSProvider

    public interface TiledRasterProvider
    Interface that should be implemented by tiled providers

    • Method Summary

      • getCoordsInTheNearestLevel

        Extent getCoordsInTheNearestLevel(Extent extent,
                                int w,
                                int h)
        Calculates the extent of a zoom level using other extent as a reference. The new extent is calculated with the same coordinate at the center.

        level -
        extent -
        w -
        h -

      • getTile

        Tile getTile(SpiRasterQuery q)
             throws TileGettingException
        Gets a tile
        Parameters:
        level - Resolution level
        tileCol - Tile column in the resolution level
        tileRow - Tile row in the resolution level
        bbox - Bounding box of the tile
        Returns:
        Throws:
        TileGettingException

      • setTileServer

        void setTileServer(Class<?> tileServer)
                   throws InitializeException
        Sets the tile cache data server. This is the server assigned by the client. It will force to build a second level cache if the CacheStruct is not the same as the owner.
        Parameters:
        tileServer -
        Throws:
        InitializeException
